product_name: Threads for Thought Hanover Skirt - 2014 Overstock
long_description: This super comfy skirt with a high / low hem and banded waist is made using organic cotton, modal from beech trees and low-impact dyes, so you can feel good in more ways than one when you wear it.
short_description: This super comfy skirt with a high / low hem and banded waist is made using organic cotton, modal from beech trees and low-impact dyes, so you can feel good in more ways than one when you wear it.
